Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The DECLARE model has various keys, each corresponding to different types of declarative rules.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Each key in the DECLARE model should point to another dictionary where the keys are activities, and the values are dictionaries with 'support' and 'confidence' keys set to 1.0.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The problem doesn't specify which activities are associated with which keys. Since all activities are part of the scenario, I assume they belong to all keys in the model.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Since no additional constraints or context is provided, I decide to include all activities under each key in the overall DECLARE model.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The DECLARE model is structured with each key mapping to all activities, and support and confidence for each activity set to 1.0 as described in the problem statement.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I verify that all 18 keys (4 from the first group and 14 from the second group) are included in the final dictionary model.
